verses.text_plain: Lord, thou hast been our dwelling place in all generations.
verses.verse_html:
1Lord, thou hast been our dwelling place in all generations. ▼
▼ A Prayer…: or, A Prayer, being a Psalm of Moses
 , ▼
▼ in…: Heb. in generation and generation

tokens.text: thou hast been our dwelling place

footnotes.body_text: ▼ A Prayer…: or, A Prayer, being a Psalm of Moses
footnotes.body_html: ▼ A Prayer…: or, A Prayer, being a Psalm of Moses

footnotes.body_text: ▼ in…: Heb. in generation and generation
footnotes.body_html: ▼ in…: Heb. in generation and generation

verses.text_plain: Before the mountains were brought forth, or ever thou hadst formed the earth and the world, even from everlasting to everlasting, thou art God.
verses.verse_html: 2Before the mountains were brought forth, or ever thou hadst formed the earth and the world, even from everlasting to everlasting, thou art God.

verses.text_plain: Thou turnest man to destruction; and sayest, Return, ye children of men.
verses.verse_html: 3Thou turnest man to destruction; and sayest, Return, ye children of men.

verses.text_plain: For a thousand years in thy sight are but as yesterday when it is past, and as a watch in the night.
verses.verse_html:
4For a thousand years in thy sight are but as yesterday when it is past, and as a watch in the night. ▼
▼ when…: or, when he hath passed them

footnotes.body_text: ▼ when…: or, when he hath passed them
footnotes.body_html: ▼ when…: or, when he hath passed them

verses.text_plain: Thou carriest them away as with a flood; they are as a sleep: in the morning they are like grass which groweth up.
verses.verse_html:
5Thou carriest them away as with a flood; they are as a sleep: in the morning they are like grass which groweth up. ▼
▼ groweth…: or, is changed

tokens.text: Thou carriest them away as with a flood

footnotes.body_html: ▼ groweth…: or, is changed

verses.text_plain: In the morning it flourisheth, and groweth up; in the evening it is cut down, and withereth.
verses.verse_html: 6In the morning it flourisheth, and groweth up; in the evening it is cut down, and withereth.

verses.text_plain: For we are consumed by thine anger, and by thy wrath are we troubled.
verses.verse_html: 7For we are consumed by thine anger, and by thy wrath are we troubled.

verses.text_plain: Thou hast set our iniquities before thee, our secret sins in the light of thy countenance.
verses.verse_html: 8Thou hast set our iniquities before thee, our secret sins in the light of thy countenance.

verses.text_plain: For all our days are passed away in thy wrath: we spend our years as a tale that is told.
verses.verse_html:
9For all our days are passed away in thy wrath: we spend our years as a tale that is told. ▼
▼ passed…: Heb. turned away
 , ▼
▼ as a…: or, as a meditation

footnotes.body_html: ▼ passed…: Heb. turned away

footnotes.body_text: ▼ as a…: or, as a meditation
footnotes.body_html: ▼ as a…: or, as a meditation

verses.text_plain: The days of our years are threescore years and ten; and if by reason of strength they be fourscore years, yet is their strength labour and sorrow; for it is soon cut off, and we fly away.
verses.verse_html:
10The days of our years are threescore years and ten; and if by reason of strength they be fourscore years, yet is their strength labour and sorrow; for it is soon cut off, and we fly away. ▼
▼ The days…: Heb. As for the days of our years, in them are seventy years

tokens.text: and if by reason of strength

footnotes.body_text: ▼ The days…: Heb. As for the days of our years, in them are seventy years
footnotes.body_html: ▼ The days…: Heb. As for the days of our years, in them are seventy years

verses.text_plain: Who knoweth the power of thine anger? even according to thy fear, so is thy wrath.
verses.verse_html: 11Who knoweth the power of thine anger? even according to thy fear, so is thy wrath.

verses.text_plain: So teach us to number our days, that we may apply our hearts unto wisdom.
verses.verse_html:
12So teach us to number our days, that we may apply our hearts unto wisdom. ▼
▼ apply: Heb. cause to come

footnotes.body_html: ▼ apply: Heb. cause to come

verses.text_plain: Return, O Lord, how long? and let it repent thee concerning thy servants.
verses.verse_html: 13Return, O Lord, how long? and let it repent thee concerning thy servants.

tokens.text: how long? and let it repent

verses.text_plain: O satisfy us early with thy mercy; that we may rejoice and be glad all our days.
verses.verse_html: 14O satisfy us early with thy mercy; that we may rejoice and be glad all our days.

verses.text_plain: Make us glad according to the days wherein thou hast afflicted us, and the years wherein we have seen evil.
verses.verse_html: 15Make us glad according to the days wherein thou hast afflicted us, and the years wherein we have seen evil.

verses.text_plain: Let thy work appear unto thy servants, and thy glory unto their children.
verses.verse_html: 16Let thy work appear unto thy servants, and thy glory unto their children.

verses.text_plain: And let the beauty of the Lord our God be upon us: and establish thou the work of our hands upon us; yea, the work of our hands establish thou it.
verses.verse_html: 17And let the beauty of the Lord our God be upon us: and establish thou the work of our hands upon us; yea, the work of our hands establish thou it.
